t: Amazon.com : blinger® Shimmer Starter Kit with Gold-Plated blinger Gem Stamper & 90 Precision-Cut Glass Crystals | DIY Bedazzler Kit for Hair & Skin : Beauty & Personal Care
s: This is the first blinger kit that I have seen that seems to be particularly geared towards adult women. Not that women can't use the kid's version, but this package shows a grown woman with sparkles in her hair, not a child or teenager. Another detail is that the crystals included aren't just rhinestones, they are specifically Swarovski crystals. Most children wouldn't care about the brand ...

t: Blinger is AWESOME!
s: My daughters ( 7 and 10 ) absolutely love Blinger. They were very easy to apply in their hair and the gems looked spectacular! I was honestly surprised that even after swimming in the pool all the gems stayed in place! Removing Blinger from their hair was super easy too.
